summary: the CBC and the transcript abundance of cytokines and their receptors expressed in leukocytes were measured from calves at two early timepoints. results Blood was collected from calves at pre-conditioning (n = 796) and weaning (n = 791) for CBC. at diagnosis, neutrophils were higher and basophils lower in sick animals (P 0.05).
